Summary: Multiple starlike objects flying in many directions. Regular jet airforce patrols.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis night was warmer than all the other cold winter nights so I went out with the intention to observe for any interesting aerospace activity. The sky was active with multiple starlike objects. Two had been observed flying toward each other but not on a collision course. Many of the other starlike objects had been going almost directly West, East, etc. Like they were following a grid. It appeared that jet aircraft had been regularly patrolling the skies. A few looked like they were getting a closer look at me. I had cameras with me but didn't feel the need to record anything. I am however investing in a pair of night vision binoculars soon to record the night sky. It will surely come in handy... Further down investment for my UFO research is a device that monitors the electromagnetic spektrum and EMF radiation.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Moose Jaw
There was one other sighting in Moose Jaw on or around February 2nd 2011
